alert.note: Alert for Madison; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 3:16PM CDT until June 05 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rankin County in central Mississippi... East central Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 316 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Farmhaven, or 14 miles east of Canton, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pisgah around 355 PM CDT. Goshen Springs around 410 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
